    Menu - Class in task04
    The Menu class implements the Command interface and represents a console menu that allows the user to interact with various ConsoleCommand objects.
    Menu() - Constructor for class task04.Menu
    Constructs a Menu object with the default BufferedReader using System.in for reading user input.

    Constructs a Menu object with a custom BufferedReader.
